item.title: Tele tab help. (not emote tab teleports)
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Those are actually Falador’s coordinates, but I need to get it to click and tele you to specific places. I have 13 tele tabs coded into the server, but I need to get them recognize by the server as a teleport. But, my problem is that it says its an orphaned case. I don’t know how to correct this.

Read full topic

item.description:
@dyde08 wrote:

This post will not be help to you at all most likely, i havn’t coded since last summer, so i don’t know much
AT ALL anymore.

But…don’t you need to set it somehow to where when you click it, it teles you. Right now it just
looks like you copied the tele from some sort of actual tele, (Eg. Varrock).

Read full topic
item.source: Tele tab help. (not emote tab teleports)

item.title: Tele tab help. (not emote tab teleports)
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Hey, I was trying to create tele tabs on my server. I added the model and the inits. correctly and I made them stackable and tradeable. I got to the part in client.java to state the case to teleport. My code was like this:

	case 15063: // this is the tele tab id
		if(teleblock == true) {
	sM("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");
	}
else
	{
    			teleportToX = 2965;
   			 teleportToY = 3379;
    			heightLevel = 0;
    			updateRequired = true;
    			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			sM("You teleport to thislocation!"); // its thislocation because I haven't decided were they teleport you. 
		deleteItem(15063, getItemSlot(15063), 1);
	}

break;

Then I saved client.java and compiled. This showed up: client.java:11057: orphaned case
case 15063:
^

If you know what the problem is please post. I really need these fixed.

Read full topic
item.source: Tele tab help. (not emote tab teleports)
